lead_paragraph: ADAMS--Lisa Bonchek. July 29, 1969 - March 6, 2015. Your words are timeless: "Find a bit of beauty in the world today. Share it. If you can't find it, create it. Some days this may be hard to do. Persevere." You have been and always will be that bit of beauty. We miss you. Adams/Bonchek Families 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  ADAMS, LISA BONCHEK
